Subconcepts:    - Best Friend: Friend with a stronger bond, longer duration of friendship, shared secrets, greater support.       - Attributes: Closest secrets, Shared history       - Relationships: More frequent and intimate communication and shared activities.   - School Friend: A Friend made from school.       - Attributes: School Attended Together, Years of Schooling Together       - Relationships: Shared school experiences/ memories, Alumni   - Childhood Friend: A Friend made during early years.       - Attributes: Same Neighborhood, Common Games, Years of Friendship       - Relationships: Shared childhood experiences.   - Work Friend: A Friend made from the workplace.       - Attributes: Same Workplace, Same Project/Task/Department, Common Work Interests       - Relationships: Shared work experiences, office politics/conflicts.   - Online Friend: A Friend made over internet platforms.       - Attributes: Common Online Platform or Game, Online Interactions, Common Interests       - Relationships: Shared Online Experiences, Gaming Partners.3. Associated Concepts:   - Trust: An important factor in friendship.   - Loyalty: Another important factor in friendship.   - Empathy: Being able to understand and share the feelings of another.   - Respect: A feeling of deep admiration for someone elicited by their abilities, qualities, or achievements.4. Not Friend:   - Enemy: The opposite of a friend.   - Stranger: A person whom one does not know or with whom one is not familiar.
